name: Task control
description:
You have to play as a special agent and clear objects from terrorists! You need to be smart and do everything possible to stay alive and neutralize the enemies. Destroy enemies one by one or break in and destroy the crowd, the choice is always yours!

Task control is a 2D platformer with action elements. You have to play as a special agent and destroy enemies on the level, moving around the locations. Your goal: Destroy the maximum number of enemies and complete the level. First aid kits and grenades will always come to your aid!

Game Features:
- Pixel graphics
- Various levels
- Pleasant musical accompaniment
